3029.title: Monaco.redplug
3029.author: Anonymous
3029.description:
Monaco is one of the most famous and distinctive racing circuits in the world. The course passes through the narrow streets of Monte-Carlo for two miles, with some very tight corners and elevation changes. The plugin was the result of a collaboration involving half a dozen of RL's track-makers  modelers (the RL-TMC -- Track Makers Cooperative). This is arguably the most complex plugin for RL and is likely to remain the most realistic simulation of a real track. Download it and take your favorite wheels for a spin on the Cote d'Azur...
RL-TMC, 2008

2962.title: FerrariTestarossa
2962.author: Anonymous
2962.description: '91 Ferrari Testarossa v1.0 by David Drew. To install this plugin, download it, decompress it, then quit Redline, copy the "'91 Ferrari Testarossa.redplug" file into the "Plug-Ins" folder in your Redline folder, and relaunch Redline.

3036.title: Silverstone 1.1.redplug
3036.author: Anonymous
3036.description: This is the Formula 1 track used by the British Grand Prix. The track was built on an old World War II airfield, so its very flat. However, there are few long straights here, you have to drive a tight line to get a fast time around all the combinations of curves. I put lots of scenery models in, with some significant help from thomm and djpimley, so there's plenty to look at as you fly around. Keep your eyes out for some interesting sights... Thanks are also due to slowDan for the skybox images and tons of track making modeling help, and C14ru5 for general track making tips. Version 1.1 is identical to 1.0, except that many textures were compressed, so 1.1 should run much faster than 1.0 for those with older Macs. Created by Pax-raider.

3350.title: Invisible Corvette
3350.author: Anonymous
3350.description: An invisible Corvette... could possibly use as a rogue in BL games.

3018.title: C14ru5 Spa-Francorchamps1.2
3018.author: Anonymous
3018.description:
Circuit de Spa-Francorchamps is a racing circuit in Belgium which plays a very important role in Formula 1 and Endurance racing history (perhaps only beaten by Monaco Grand Prix and Le Mans Circuit de la Sarthe, respectively). The track is originally from 1924, although it saw a major redesign in 1979 for its reappearance in the Formula 1 World Championship. This redline plugin is modeled after the 2004 F1 layout, which together with Suzuka Circuit is considered one of the two most challenging track layouts in the world. Challenging, difficult, but also rewarding once you get the hang of it.

For a more authentic racing challenge, use the two included weather types: Spa-Dry and Spa-Wet. They create gravel traps and bumpy curbs, which will surely keep you on your toes. You probably want to learn the track in a slower car, watch the AI and brake brake brake. You must learn to lose time, in order to avoid losing more time if you go off the track. Then move on to faster cars as you gain experience and learn the behavior of the track and the cars. Just don't get complacent, and you will start seeing consistent lap times. Thanks to thomm for the modeling, and thanks to the Redline community beta testers!

2951.title: Cadillac XLR pack 1.5
2951.author: Anonymous
2951.description: The XLR is a luxury roadster sold by the Cadillac and is based on the same Y-body platform as the Chevrolet Corvette. The XLR uses the Cadillac Northstar engine and has its own unique styling, interior, and suspension, and has a power-retractable aluminum hardtop. The engine is Cadillac's 4.6 L Northstar tuned for 320 hp, mated as of the 2007 model year to a 6-speed automatic transmission. The XLR-V uses the same supercharged Northstar V8 as the STS-V, though output is down somewhat. For the XLR-V, the engine is certified by the SAE to produce 443 hp (330 kW) and 414 ft-lbf (561 Nm). The supercharger and four intercoolers are built into the intake manifold. A six-speed automatic transmission, larger brakes from the Z51 Corvette, and 19-inch wheels will also be used.

3038.title: slowDan-BlackForest-1-0
3038.author: Anonymous
3038.description: This is a track in the style of the Nürburgring Nordschleife, but not the location. It's approximately 6.5km long with an elevation change of around 80m. Set (obviously!) in the Black Forest region of Germany. This is a (mostly) high speed circuit with a nicely cambered road to help you round the corners. Or punish you horribly if you get it wrong. This is the final update to 1.0. Enjoy! slowDan.

3189.title: Audi S6 Avant
3189.author: DonaemouS
3189.description:
The S6 Avant is a high-performance version of the Audi A6, an executive car produced by German automaker Audi.

The S6, like all Audi "S" models, is fitted as standard with Audi's trademark quattro four-wheel drive (4WD) system, the S6 using the Torsen-based permanent 4WD and features an all aluminium alloy 5,204 cc Fuel Stratified Injection (FSI) 40-valve V10 petrol engine, derived from the Lamborghini Gallardo, re-tuned to produce 320 kW (430 bhp) at 6800 rpm and 540 Nm of torque between 3000 - 4000 rpm. It utilises twin chain-driven double overhead camshafts (DOHC), and variable valve timing for both intake and exhaust valves.

3024.title: gcw-pembrey
3024.author: Anonymous
3024.description: Pembrey. The small flat Welsh race track with one of the best combinations of corners in the whole of the UK, this is also supposed to be one of the late Ayrton Senna's favourite circuits to test F1 cars.

3049.title: Whitehillv10b
3049.author: Anonymous
3049.description: Whitehill 1.0b by Fuglz - This track was meant to be a real challenge. Long and twisty, up and down, sharp 180 degrees turns, leading to almost endless meters of safety zones. Feel your heart pumping as you drive to the dreaded Eyes of Zorro, and course as you spin out in Bastage Corner. Keep your hopes up, and you will eventually pass the finish-line. Victory.

2958.title: DeLorean 14 1.3.redplug
2958.author: Anonymous
2958.description: Version 1.3 of my DMC 14! Color and logo name, couple of changes in the .car, email me at imanamericanidiot33@yahoo.com . Again, it's a joke car, don't take this seriously =)

3187.title: BMW Z4 M
3187.author: Andreu
3187.description: Plug-in created by Andreu. This is the 2006 BMW Z4 M, Coupe version. A pretty nice car, easier to drive and faster than the Z3. Lots of fun with it. Enjoy!

3019.title: Deathv1.1
3019.author: Anonymous
3019.description: Don't Crash!  In this awesome map you'll be lucky not to be hit head on by another car, because there's a straitaway where you drive in both directions and it can be pretty awesome.  Great in both reverse and normal, best for net play and lots of players.  Email: ajwweb@earthlink.net

3004.title: Vauxhall Vectra BTCC
3004.author: Anonymous
3004.description: Vauxhall Vectra BTCC 1.1 This is my version of the Vauxhall Vectra entered in the British Touring Car Championship this year. The car is run by VXR Racing for Vauxhall and constructed by Triple Eight Racing to the FIA Super 2000 rules as used in the World Touring Car Championship. I'm hoping this will be the first car in a new class for the Redline Racing League based on the same Super 2000 rules. Many thanks to X-trac for help with available gear ratios for this class of car. slowDan

2964.title: Formula 1
2964.author: Anonymous
2964.description: Formula 1 racer v1.2 by David Drew.  This car is designed for racing on asphalt based tracks that are mostly flat, such as the Short Circuit and High Speed Loop tracks.  Racing on other tracks may result in undesired performance.  To install this plugin, download it, decompress it, then quit Redline, copy the "Formula 1.redplug" file into the "Plug-Ins" folder in your Redline folder, and relaunch Redline.

2996.title: Rocket.redplug
2996.author: Anonymous
2996.description:
A sort of like pimped Diablo. Reaching it's top speed it flips, and it can't turn unless you stop. Good for racing against the Drag Racer. My first plug-in, enjoy :)
D-ATTACK

3015.title: bru-Short-Road-Rally
3015.author: Anonymous
3015.description: Small Road Rally: Based on Redline's Small Rally Track, with the big jump removed. This all paved track is a good test of a car's handling and a driver's skill.

2991.title: PaganiZonda 1.1b
2991.author: Anonymous
2991.description: A simulation of the stunning Pagani Zonda F supercar. Pagani's good friend Juan Manuel Fangio was heavily involved in the project and the Zonda was destined to bear his name. After the great man passed away, Pagani felt he could not take his name in vain. But he wished to pay homage to the man rated by many as the best racing driver of all time. This car, his greatest car to date, is far more than a fitting tribute.

3433.title: Mercedes E63 AMG
3433.author: DonaemouS
3433.description: After the powerful BMW M5, Audi S6 (Avant), and the small Volvo S60 R, here the real monster. The Mercedes E63 AMG. This 6,3 litres is a warehouse for power. So, to fit this car in the same M5/S6 class, I worked on handling. Well, You\'ll need skills to handle this car through turns.

2940.title: blown vette v1-1
2940.author: Anonymous
2940.description: This is a souped up '68 Vette (like the one in the game), fitted with a new exhaust system (including side pipes), a supercharger and 325/45-17 tires at the back. A reworked suspension and braking system improve the cornering performance, and a short throw gearbox means you get all 609 horses on the road quickly.  v1.1 changes the engine sound only network compatible with the old version, which can be removed.

2978.title: Honda S2000 CRv1.2
2978.author: Anonymous
2978.description: Due to some comments I received on my S2000 CR post on the Web Board, I tried my hand at fixing the bugs some members told me about. That, and I massaged the front/rear sway bars slightly on the Turbo. Hopefully this is the last performance modification I will need on this plug, but that remains to be seen. If you have any comments, please check out my S2000 CR forum. Thanks!

2967.title: gcw-cooper-v1.3
2967.author: Anonymous
2967.description:
An interpretation of a 1960 Cooper Climax T53 Formula One car.

The Cooper Climax, while not being the first rear-engined F1 car, marked the end of the line for forward-engined F1 cars. Designed by jack Brabham and powered by a 240HP Cooper Climax engine originally designed for a fire-pump, this funny little car powered to a number of Grand Prix victories in 1960.

Now with properly sized wheels, new colours and a brake light.

3028.title: MB Istanbul pubBeta1
3028.author: Anonymous
3028.description: Istanbul Park is one of the newest racing circuits in F1. It is known to be one of the most challenging circuits of the season, because of it's alternating slow and fast corners. Furthermore it's one of the few circuits that are driven counter-clock-wise. This is my (yet quite simple) interpretation of the Instanbul Park. But it's very drivable and really challenging (can you get though corner 8 with 240km/h?). More info in the readme.

2989.title: mustang s197 pack
2989.author: Anonymous
2989.description: Three modern era Mustangs! The 2008 GT500, a Roush-modified GT, and the FR500GT3 racer! Vroom-vroom, it's the pony express!

2979.title: Hummer H1 1.1.redplug
2979.author: Anonymous
2979.description: A Hummer fans dream come true, this plug for redline adds a trail-ready hummer, a street tuned pimped out hummer, and a hummer test track, a dirt climbing course so challenging, that the H1 is the only thing on wheels that has been known to complete it. v1.1 brings the suspension up to 1.0.3 standards as well as pointing to the correct horn sound file and softening the engine-hall sound.

2965.title: Freak Cars.redplug
2965.author: Anonymous
2965.description:
This plug replaces "Bat Mobile.redplug.zip"
Freak cars, the really freaky ones! This plug gives you 4 unique and freaky cars. First up to bat is an old classic, the re-mastered Batmobile. It has 4 unique skins representing 4 types of bats in real life. Next is the TARDIS, a throwback from Dr. Who, the TARDIS (Time And Relative Dimensions in Space) Transported Dr. Who and crew through time, and now you can follow them! Begins time travel at about 20mph., best sed in arcade and sim, or as a horde of 11 AI's! Not to be underestimated is the Yellow Submarine, It can travel through all of redlines levels as if they were made of water! And lastly the UFO, it's blinding "Abduction Ray" is garaunteed to ruin some poor farmers day (or whoever happens to be under you)

2976.title: Honda S2000 1.1
2976.author: Anonymous
2976.description:
Honda S2000 1.1
Model and plugin created by Andreu

This update incorporates a rear wing, improved textures and more realistic handling.
This is the original Honda S2000, European-American version, produced from 2000 to 2003. Comes in 6 colors. The first Honda machine to appear on the Redline arena. Not the most powerful of cars, but a nice addition to anyone's garage. 247 HP. It likes to hit the redline a lot, so keep those RPMs high no matter what. Important: Remove the old 1.0 version from the Plugins folder so that the 1.1 version can be displayed properly.

Enjoy!

3009.title: Bardagi Road v1.1.redplug
3009.author: Anonymous
3009.description: Bardagi road v1.1 - By Fuglz(the new bird). A twisty but wide-roaded track, with a couple of smooth hills and elevations. A good track time with a fast car would be 1.00 min.

2992.title: pdiablo1 2
2992.author: Anonymous
2992.description:
Pimped Diablo version 1.2, by Buzzzzy.  For those who didn't download 0.9 (as part of the MurciÃ©lago pack in the MurciÃ©lago Roadster topic), the Pimped Diablo is now crazily fast, extremely grippy, very stable, has new skins, new seats, and new lights, along with a spoiler instead of an engine grade. For those who never downloaded this car, it's a much faster version of the stock Diablo with really fat rear tires, better downforce, lower center of gravity, really grippy, great turning and stability and braking, a sixth gear, and a turbocharged supercharged (haha, both, one's imbedded in the engine sound) souped-up Ferrari Enzo engine. Fun to drive for non-sim masters even in Sim, though it understeers just a little, but can still handle corners at extreme speeds.

Credits: Original model from Redline by the Ambrosia team. Textures edited by Buzzzzy. Spoiler, wheels, and .car file by Buzzzzy.

2934.title: Alfa147JTDQ2
2934.author: Anonymous
2934.description: The Alfa Romeo 147 1.9 JTD M-JET 16V 3p. Q2 is the faster version Alfa made. The Engine is capable to achieve 208 Km/h thanks to its 150 HP and a 305nm at 2000 rpm. Engine excellence finds confirmation in the diesels powering this model: the 100 HP and 115 HP 1.9 JTD, with electronically managed Common Rail direct injection, boosted by means of a Garret supercharger. These are flanked by the new 150 HP 1.9 JTD, the first 16-valve JTD with Multijet injection system, offering a range of advantages, from more muted running to more power (110 kW at 4000 rpm), from low fuel consumption to reduced emission levels. In the new 150 HP 1.9 JTD, 90% of peak torque becomes available between 1750 and 3250 rpm, for a prompt response in any situation.

3041.title: slowDan-Gorge-1.0
3041.author: Anonymous
3041.description:
The Gorge 1.0

My first Redline track. Probably best suited for high speed races in arcade mode (or Turbo). The AI drivers don't have a clue so if you want a challenge get online with it.

Have fun! slowDan.

2966.title: gcw-ar8c35-v1.0
2966.author: Anonymous
2966.description:
An interpretation of a 1935 Alfa Romeo Tipo C as driven by Tazio Nuvolari in Grands Prix of 1935 and 1936.

This Grand Prix racer has a 4 litre, 8 cylinder inline, engine with two roots superchargers generating an astonishing 330 bhp capable of driving this lightweight streamlined chassis all the way up to 175 mph.

2987.title: Micro Cars.redplug
2987.author: Anonymous
2987.description:
This plug replaces "Radio Flyer.redplug.zip"
Micro cars, the really tiny ones! this plug has you racing in a Shriner car, a little red wagon, and a golf cart. Have fun going under more high slung cars in the shriner, out accelerating normal cars in the radio flyer, and sailing past normal cars in the turns with the golf cart!

3026.title: Jump Of Death
3026.author: Anonymous
3026.description: The Jump Of Death - by Anders (the new bird) Fuglz. A small but difficult track I made with the redline Tool Chest, using the Default roadtype. It features a jump that, if failed, knocks you out of the race. To make the jump you'll probably need one of the faster cars, but it should be (barely) possible to make it even with a mini. It also contains some quite difficult turns, along with some other stuff I've been experimenting with, while using the track editor. I was not able to make an overview of the track, but since it's so small, an overview isn't really needed.

2941.title: bmw m5 20
2941.author: Anonymous
2941.description: Introduced in 1998 at the Geneva Motor Show, production did not begin until late October of that year. A total of 20,482 E39 M5s were made from 1998 to 2003.pThe E39 M5 had a highly tuned V8 engine based on the M62 engine called the S62, which displaced 4.9 L and produced 400 bhp. The engine featured a 7000 RPM redline, Double-VANOS, which varies the intake and exhaust valves for both cylinder banks, and individual throttle butterflies for each of the cylinders, allowing for a much faster engine response time.pM5 E39 engine specs:394 hp (294 kW) 0-62 mph - 4.9 s. Top Speed: 155 mph (250 km/h) (electronic limited), 186 mph (305 km/h ) (without electronic limiter)

2983.title: MacBuddyTimeMachine
2983.author: Anonymous
2983.description:
The MacBuddy Time Machine looks and drives exactly like the Redline Built-in Time Machine (The Delorean). This is still in its Beta form But drives smooth and quick. The top speed is 220 MPH. You can lap 9 Al Driver before the end.

Enjoy your flying.

MacBuddy

2935.title: AliensAPC 1.1
2935.author: Anonymous
2935.description: United States Colonial Marines' M557 Armoured Personnel Carrier, the famous fictional vehicle from the movie Aliens. This is a 1:2 scale reproduction of the M557 featured in the film, with the weight and power plant adjusted accordingly.

3002.title: Trabant 1.6
3002.author: Anonymous
3002.description: The iconic 1964 Trabant 601, infamous for its reputation as possibly the worst car ever made. In fact in many ways the Trabant is ingenious in design and intelligent in manufacture, but it ain't a race car. Enjoy the Trabi experience in all 7 craptastic original colours. The Trabant 1.8T is a Trabant rerofitted with a 1.8L engine from an Audi TT for a ton of tyre-smoking fun.

2931.title: Plug-in-Splitter-1.1
2931.author: Anonymous
2931.description: Plug-in Splitter for Redline is a tool for extracting files from Redline plug-ins, and converting Redlines custom texture format into PNG images.

2997.title: Sauber-Mercedes-C9-1-1
2997.author: Anonymous
2997.description: My interpretation of the Sauber Mercedes C9. Now updated to 1.1 to take advantage of the downforce fix in Redline 1.0.4. This model is based on the 1989 World Sports Car Championship and Le Mans winning version with the specs from the sprint version. Jean-Louis Schlesser won the championship, with C9 drivers filling the next three places in the points table. The first three colour schemes are based on the cars used at Le Mans.

3017.title: C14ru5-LagunaSeca1.5
3017.author: Anonymous
3017.description: Located outside Monterey, CA, Mazda Raceway Laguna Seca is a track that many racing games seek to implement correctly. Perhaps most known for its famous "Corkscrew" S-curve and its dramatic elevation change, Laguna Seca is a narrow track that rewards nimble cars with high downforce. This v1.5 implementation does seem to float mid air, and scenery is extremely sparse, but it is very accurately modeled. A must have for all racing fanatics!

2993.title: Phoenix Interceptor 1.0
2993.author: Anonymous
2993.description: JoshTigerheart's Department of Useful Plugs, with the help of Renesis, brings you a car from the future:  the Phoenix Interceptor.  An original concept designed to be competetive with the other cars out there, the Phoenix Interceptor is blindling fast with acceleration that will put other cars to shame.  But this power does come with a price of more difficult handling and weaker brakes, as to be fair competition rather than something that can just plow through everything at 200 M.P.H.  Its speed is most easily distinguished in Sim and Strict, though it can still easily outrun anything in arcade and a bit faster than most turbo.  Questions?  Comments?  Bug reports?  Speeding tickets from the RLPD?  Contact information and specific credits can be found in the included readme.

2988.title: Miura Beta 3
2988.author: Anonymous
2988.description: 1969 Lamborghini Miura SV Beta 3 (0.5, 1.0b3) by Buzzzzy.  The Miura was the first true supercar.  Right now it handles a bit too well and still has standard Miura specs instead of SV specs, which I still have to update, but the models (including wheels), textures (mostly), and the basic .car is all done, and is down to tweaking.  It really isn't all that fast, maxing out at 170-180mph, but a well-driven Miura can compete with its understeery successors like the Countach and Diablo.

3035.title: Sandy Dragway1.0.0
3035.author: Anonymous
3035.description: This was the first custom track made by a beta tester, developed as Redline was nearing public release. I started working on this track infrequently way back in beta 6 of Redline with the then uncompleted and unreleased developer tools. Read the included documentation for more information. Sandy Dragway 1.0.0 by Frinkruds.

3023.title: gcw-brandshatch-v1.1
3023.author: Anonymous
3023.description:
An interpretation of the Brands Hatch GP circuit.

This adds one track to Redline, the 2.4 mile Brands Hatch GP circuit. This is my personal interpretation of the circuit based on one visit, lots of reference material, and much consulting of Google Earth for the details of the terrain.

The circuit can easily be toured in a Golf GTI in under 1:54'00. Your mileage may vary.

2974.title: GT90.redplug
2974.author: Anonymous
2974.description:
1995 Ford GT90 Concept

Drivetrain RWD Mid Engine

Power 720hp @  6600, 660 ft-lbs @ 4750

Six Speed Gearbox

From GT90 Wiki
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ford_GT90

The Ford GT90 was a concept car manufactured by the Ford Motor Company. It was unveiled in January 1995, at the Detroit Auto Show as "the world's mightiest supercar". Claimed performance included a top speed close to 250 mph (402 km/h) from a 720 hp (537 kW) quad-turbocharged V12 engine, the exhaust of which was claimed to be hot enough to damage the body panels, requiring ceramic tiles similar to those on the space shuttle to prevent this.
The mid-engined car was a spiritual successor to the Ford GT40, taking from it some styling cues, such as doors that cut into the roofline, but little else. All angles and glass, the Ford GT90 was the first Ford to display the company's "New Edge" design philosophy. The GT90 was built around a honeycomb-section aluminum monocoque and its body panels were moulded from carbon fiber.
The GT90 was built by a small team in just over six months and, as a result, borrowed many components from another high profile stablematethe Jaguar XJ220. The all-round double wishbone suspension and the five-speed manual gearbox came from the Jaguar, while the engine was from another member of the Ford family.
The GT90's 48-valve V12 was a six-litre engine which, if Ford had ever produced it in volume, might have produced up to 720 hp (537 kW), thanks to four Garrett Systems T2 turbochargers. The engine was based on the Ford Modular engine. Two V8 engines each had portions removed, and the cut down engines were welded together. In total, this yielded a 90-degree V-12, with 90.2 mm bore and 77.3 mm stroke. After being sold, an LS1 was placed in the vehicle.
Then Ford CEO Jacques Nasser was very proud of the car, and kept a model of it on his desk.

Special thanks to the DC Cars team
Thanks to DannyL for his help in testing and debugging and for creating the custom wheels used.
The model was created and mapped by Tyranitar.
Additional thanks goes to General Antilles and the members of the Redline Ambrosia forums who's harsh criticisms that really helped make this car great.  

This is one wicked fast ride, so have fun.

2995.title: RLPDCruiserv2
2995.author: Anonymous
2995.description: 2.0 replaces all previous versions of the RLPD Cruiser (both on the addons page and in your pluggins folder) and is compatable with versions 1.0.1 onward. Look out! It's the RLPD! No not Rolling Llamas Pontificate Dubiously! it's the Redline Police Department! And they just caught you speeding! Have fun in this souped up cruiser, designed to match the performance of mid range sport vehicles (Vette, Viper, Charger). It loves city streets and is suprisingly good on a dirt track or two. Comes complete with 6 colors, limit one per household. Version 2.0 adds interior support and sports reworked brakes, better textures, and improved models.

2994.title: Porsche Boxster S v1.1
2994.author: Anonymous
2994.description:
Porsche Boxster S version 1.1. Model, textures and .car by Andreu. Engine sound by DonaemouS.
This is the 2003 S model of the Boxster. It comes in 6 standard colors plus one fantasy skin for the daring souls out there. One more roadster for the Redline collection, this time a mid-mounted engine, with a weight balance of 46/54, and a nice amount of power at 255 HP and 229 lb-ft. A pretty easy drive, not very temperamental, but perhaps not as flexible as other RWD cars. Keep an eye open for further updates, both the handling and the model beg for some improvement.
Enjoy!

3007.title: Wipeout ship 1.0.redplug
3007.author: Anonymous
3007.description:
AKA Metorce 97X 1.0 , a wipeout style ship for you to drive, detailed model and a nice texture, 4 colors and horn makes your engine flare go on ( caps lock as horn is nice ) nice tracks to race with this are death, canyon race track and other wide tracks with not very tight turns.

Have fun!

3005.title: VectorW8 v1.0
3005.author: Anonymous
3005.description:
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

The Vector W8 was the first American super car produced from 1989 to 1993. It was manufactured by Vector Aeromotive (see Vector Supercars), and was designed by Gerald Wiegert, and David Kostka. The newest, and most advanced methods of manufacture were used in building the W8s, justifying the name "Aeromotive Engineering." Group C racing technology came into play with the aluminum honeycomb semi-monicoque, and roughly 5,000 aircraft specification rivets. Everything on the Vector was designed to last the life of the owner, given that the owner maintained the vehicle. The body was made largely of lightweight carbon kevlar, known for its strength, and lightness. Just 22 W8s were produced (17 customer cars and two pre-production cars, the prototype W2, and two prototype Avtech WX-3 with a mock up of the 7.0 liter DOHC TT engine evolution), the car retailing for up to 455,000 USD new (on today's used market they are available from less than 200,000, to well over 1,000,000)
The car was based around a Rodeck resleevable V8 engine racing engine, coupled to a three-speed B+M modified transmission. The engine had twin turbochargers, which produced an advertised 625 hp (634 PS/466 kW) at 5700 rpm and 834 N·m (650 ft·lbf) of torque. The W8 had an estimated top speed of 200+ mph (338 km/h). However, in testing at the Bonneville Salt Flats, the W-2 reached 242 mph (389 km/h) with the less powerful Donovan block as reported by Top Wheels magazine. This was reached while still using the "high downforce" wing. Later aerodynamic testing further honed efficiancy bringing Cd. down to just .32 prior to DOT crash testing in Ann Arbor, MI. Some may notice the subtle changes to the body from the first car, through the later cars. These include the elimination of some gills, a lower front facia, and air splitter, revised rear wing, mirror intakes, and front grill. All in all, this lead to substantial downforce without needing the W-2's massive rear wing. Evidence of the aerodynamic capablities exsist today, as seen on a video on Jabbasworld, Youtube, and Nthimage. After the top speed testing was completed, no more Vector W8's were fitted with a removable glass roof, as buffeting occurred at those extreme speeds.
The W8 was essentially an upgrade of the same company's earlier prototype, the Vector W2. Among the famous customers for the car was tennis star Andre Agassi, who had his car delivered for his birthday party. Late that night, he had an infamous incident when his car locked up, and spun during excessive speeds without all the necessary radiators installed. He was half way from his home towared Las Vegas. Vector claims that this is because he demended for his car before it could be finished, and he ignored their recommendations not to drive it until they could do the final work.[citation needed] Vector intended to follow the W8 with the Vector WX-3 and Vector WX-3R, but series production never got off the ground. Production of the W8 ended in 1993, when the company was illegally taken over by Megatech, but Wiegert won back the design copyrights, equipment, and remaining unsold cars, including the car in a VW museum in Germany.
A red W8 made a rare appearance in the 1993 movie Rising Sun starring Sean Connery and Wesley Snipes. The car was owned by the character Eddie.

Model created by Tyranitar
Texture Mapping by Tyranitar
Car File by Tyranitar
Wheels by Danny L
Special Thanks to DC Cars for their help and Support
Special Thanks to the Beta Testers
Special Thanks to General Antilles who sets a very high par
No thanks to the idiot who decided to put a 3 speed in this thing

3042.title: SmugglersRun.redplug
3042.author: Anonymous
3042.description:
SmugglersRun is a simple yet challenging track designed for Smuggler racing.
The goal was to provide an even playing field for Vettes and Minis:
Nice stretches, twisting tunnels, bumpy curves, and two pits for Minis to escape to.
The map overlay has been omitted to further offset the Vette's advantage.
(AI Vettes and AI Minis usually finish in a dead heat)

Version 1.6 11/26/06
Submitted by HenryK and RM

2971.title: gcw-radical-sr4-v1.2
2971.author: Anonymous
2971.description: The Radical SR4. A two-seater racing car born out the combination of a light frame and bespoke suspension with a powerful motorcycle engine and chain drive. This SR4 features the 1300cc Suzuki engine and street-legal package.

2972.title: gcw-smart-v1.2
2972.author: Anonymous
2972.description:
The Smart Roadster Brabus and Smart Roadster Coupé Brabus V6 special.

The Smart Roadster is the rag-top sports version of the original Smart car from Daimler-Chrysler. The Brabus Roadster has a three-cylinder 698cc 101bhp turbocharged engine, the V6 has two of these amazing engines joined together in a configuration described as a 1396cc, bi-turbo engine giving it nearly 70bhp more at the cost of the already limited luggage space.

2969.title: gcw-mini-cooper-v1.0
2969.author: Anonymous
2969.description:
An interpretation of a 1964 Mk 1 Morris Mini Cooper 1275 Special.

This car comes in two flavours, the original customer car, with skinny tyres and five paint jobs, and the racing version which has been stripped of some weight, fitted with a roll-cage and racing headlights as well as wider, stickier tyres which require plastic add-ons to the wheel arches. The racing version comes in the classic Italian Job colours, plus black, and a Mary Quant special.

2985.title: Mazda MX-5 Miata v1.0.redplug
2985.author: Anonymous
2985.description: Plugin created by Andreu and Tomte. It is the Mazda Miata, what else is there to say? Ah yes, NC version, latest one, 2006 that is. I forget the HP, but it is not much. Easy to drive, easy to handle, hard to tip over, agile car. For some fun stuff, try turning the car over, every color variation comes with a different pretty underside. From jelly beans to bricks. Comes in 8 colors, some of them standard, some not. Only hoodless version available now. It is a roadster after all. Also, there is a female driver now! Enjoy!

2963.title: Ford Focus WRC.redplug
2963.author: Anonymous
2963.description: The Ford Focus RS WRC.  If you are a rally fan you may like this plug.  This model was introduced in 2006 and has since won Ford two FIA rally manufacturer's titles in a row, and appears to be on its way to a third.  This plug includes the BP Ford/Abu Dhabi paintjob seen in the current championship.

2982.title: Jeep 2.8
2982.author: Anonymous
2982.description: The original 1941 Jeep MB, was the answer to the U.S. Armys call for a light, four-wheel drive, general-purpose vehicle and scout car. The 1971 Jeep Renegade II, marked the moment the Jeep became a sports leisure vehicle. It scored wins in the Baja, Riverside and Mint 400 off-road races. The AMC-401 is a modified CJ5 model with a V8 engine and 5-speed transmission.

3050.title: windMup.redplug
3050.author: Anonymous
3050.description: First attempt at track creation. Not a lot of objects or scenery. A few elevation changes. Sweeping turns, a track where you can keep your foot in it and "wind 'em up".

3037.title: Ski Slope
3037.author: Anonymous
3037.description: JoshTigerheart's Department of Useful Plugs, with help from EVWeb, release the updated version of Ski Slope, the 1.2.1 version!  Ski Slope is a very simple track, simply a big downhill with a uphill jump at the end.  The object is not to reach the finish line first, but to jump farther than anyone else.  The track is non-looping and is not meant to be played in reverse.  Questions?  Comments?  Bug Reports? Fire an email to the address found in the readme.  Credits to specific parts about the track and what you can and cannot use for free are also found in there.

2952.title: Citroen c4.redplug
2952.author: Anonymous
2952.description: The slightly improved C4 rally plug.  Although it is far from perfect, hopefully it will be an enjoyable drive.  The handling is very predictable and you can even use the handbrake on hairpins, in sim mode too!

2973.title: GR2BMW2002 tii.redplug
2973.author: Anonymous
2973.description:
Groupe II BMW 2002 tii par Mirage
Infos: http://homepage.mac.com/frank_de_jong/Pages/1974%20Cars.html

3039.title: slowDan-Dantona-1-1-1
3039.author: Anonymous
3039.description: My interpretation of Daytona International Speedway. Great fun at enormously high speed. Now updated to 1.1.1. Includes better lighting effects and new billboards as well as a better start position to stop those nasty donuts. Enjoy! slowDan.

2986.title: Mercedes SL300
2986.author: Anonymous
2986.description: Mercedes SL300 "Gullwing" v1.0 - by Fuglz (the new bird). A fast car with good handling, but with slow acceleration. Faster than the mustang, slower than the vette. Looks best in rain or moonlight. Expect updates both on physics and graphics.

3006.title: Volvo240 v1
3006.author: Anonymous
3006.description: - By Fuglz (the new bird). The Volvo 240, volvos best selling car through all time. Produced between 1974 and 1993, it's a sturdy and reliable vessel, good both on-track and off-track. This version features a 1982 Volvo 240 GLT Turbo engine, putting it in terms of engine power slightly ahead of the DeLorean.

3048.title: Volcano
3048.author: Anonymous
3048.description: Drive into the bottom of a Volcano and get shot out the top!  Hard turns on the way back down.  Great map with custom sky.  Website: http://evweb.aresaxis.us/  Email: ajwweb@earthlink.net

2999.title: Stratus GTS.redplug
2999.author: Anonymous
2999.description: The 1971 Dodge Stratus GT-S, a fictitious muscle car plug by TH.  Quick acceleration and lots of under-steer.  The car feels heavy but the handling is predictable, even if you start to lose traction.  This car does not include shadows and the windows are tinted black to make up for the lack of an interior model.  First attempt at making a plug, but hopefully worth the download.

2956.title: corvette z06 13
2956.author: Anonymous
2956.description: V1.3 of the Corvette Z06 plug-in, containing the Z06 and ZR1 road cars and the C6.R GT1 and Z06.R GT3 race cars.

3297.title: BEAR'S Loop 3.0
3297.author: GUMMY BEAR
3297.description: This is the last and possibly final version of my 2nd track.  I hope you like it.

3027.title: MAZ-TheBigLoop3.0.redplug
3027.author: Anonymous
3027.description: I have posted a track for all those that want to drive top speed. It is essentially a bigger version of the standard loop. Great for multiplayer races on Arcade using the F1 car by David Drew. Version three adds an overview map of the track and fellow racers while drving. The track has objects and a finish line. Download version 3.0 below. Enjoy! MAZ

3045.title: SpringfieldLongTrack.redplug
3045.author: Anonymous
3045.description: Long track with default roadtypes and overview. This track is the best way to learn how to fly with space ship. But be carefull to not fall into the pit, I'm not sure you will ever go out!

2945.title: bru-Mustang-350E-1.1
2945.author: Anonymous
2945.description: Mustang 350E - A variation of Redline's Mustang model. The 350E is lighter, less powerful, with better tires. Weight and power are from a 65 Mustang GT350, tires from Redline's Mustang Hot Rod.

3012.title: bru-country-dirt
3012.author: Anonymous
3012.description: Country Dirt Track - This is Redline's City Short Circuit converted to dirt. Elevation changes have been added to the main straightaway. Fencing that discourages wall riding has been used.

2984.title: MackCruiseliner 1.0
2984.author: Anonymous
2984.description: The Mack Cruiseliner is a cab-over-engine truck, built by the famous U.S. truck maker from 1975 to 1983.

2953.title: Citroen Xsara 1.1
2953.author: Anonymous
2953.description: Version 1.1 of the Citroen Xsara WRC.  A new model and some minor fixes make this plug superior to the now obsolete version 1.

2961.title: dp-911 Pack II.redplug
2961.author: Anonymous
2961.description: Porsche 911 Pack II: Porsche 911 3.0 SC, 911 3.2 Clubsport, 911 RUF CTR  The 3.0 SC is the mid-life 911, with a notchy shifter, a 204 hp engine that was powerful in its day, and a relatively supple suspension. It is easy enough to handle for those who know what they're doing. This example has no spoiler included to ruin its sculpted lines. It is fitted with modest performance tires, and is a bone-stock factory car. It will normally compete with sporting road cars young and old such as the Audi TT, Mustang, Mini and 2002.  The 3.2 Clubsport is a 3.2 Carrera stripped to its bare essentials, and delivered almost exclusively in the included colour. Most were fitted with the whale tail. The engine was reworked for higher revving, and although the official specs are the same as the normal Carrera, anecdotal evidence suggests a slightly higher output. It also had better suspension components. This release tries to emulate the real car in every way possible, with educated guesses at some specs.  The RUF CTR (aka Yellowbird) is a twin turbo tuner car famous for reaching up to 213 mph. Fear it.

3040.title: slowDan-Drift Loop 1.0
3040.author: Anonymous
3040.description: There seems to ba a lot of interest for a purpose built drifting track, so I thought I'd make one. I didn't go for a plain circle as I thought that would get old pretty quick but it is almost entirely corner. Enjoy! - slowDan

2943.title: bru-Charger-Neue-1.4
2943.author: Anonymous
2943.description: The body is a caricature of the Charger: longer, lower. The engine is the drag car engine. The running gear is an attempt to tame the excessive power. The car is fast, but difficult to drive. Use the brakes to set up your turns. For version 1.4: fixed wheel friction typo on one wheel, lowered RPM of torque curve to match drag car, lowered sound volume.

2977.title: Honda S2000 1.2
2977.author: Anonymous
2977.description:
Update of the Honda S2000, version 1.2, now with Da Drift Machine included!
Model and plugin created by Andreu. This update incorporates improved handling and a couple of fixes. This is the original Honda S2000, European-American version, produced from 2000 to 2003. Comes in 6 colors, 2 for Da Drift Machine. The first Honda machine to appear on the Redline arena. Not the most powerful of cars, but a stylish addition to anyone's garage. 247 HP. It likes to hit the redline a lot, so keep those RPMs high no matter what. Important: remove all the old S2K versions from the Plugins folder to avoid compatibility issues.
Enjoy!

3043.title: Springfield Tunnel.redplug
3043.author: Anonymous
3043.description: Long track based on jechter valley roadtypes. Simplier than Zaarocks valley, without too much obstacles but with some dangerous bumps and rails. Have fun with it!

2981.title: JaguarXJ220 2.1
2981.author: Anonymous
2981.description: Presenting the big, beautiful, brutal, world famous Jaguar XJ220 supercar, and the 1993 XJ220C Le Mans winner. The XJ220C is the racing version of the XJ220. This car is an interpretation of the three works XJ220C's that were entered in the 1993 Le Mans 24 Hour race, in the newly created Grand Touring Class.

2932.title: Ren Environments.redplug
2932.author: Anonymous
2932.description:
This plug includes 4 new environment types to explore. These environments as of now are:
Monsoon - Extremely heavy rain, reduces car speed somewhat, due to increased drag against the tires on the road, increased air resistance from the rain, and decreased combustion efficiency due to the moisture.
Blizzard - Extremely heavy snow, reduces car traction on main roads due to unseen ice patches and fresh snow, shoulders of any road slow vehicles down due to the slush that builds up there.
Fog - Thick fog that has rolled in from the east, no effect on traction, minor effects on air resistance and combustion efficiency.
Firestorm - The world is freaking ending, Earth has collided with another planet (increasing the gravity), the asphalt is so hot, it gives any tire good gripping power. Other wierd things happen too, probably somthing to to with the earths magnetic field going haywire, I dunno, stop asking me questions.

2954.title: Citroen Xsara T4.redplug
2954.author: Anonymous
2954.description: Citroen Xsara T4 rally car plug by TH.  Includes a Citroen/Total WRT paint job.  Currently no interior model, but hopefully it doesn't distract too much.  A bit of work went into the texture and I did some research on the specs to give it a more authentic feel.  A fairly good match for some of the other rally type cars on redline.

2950.title: C14ru5-OpelMantaGTE
2950.author: Anonymous
2950.description: The Opel Manta GT/E, 1979 model. The Manta spawned an entire sub-culture in Germany, and two German blockbuster movies carry its name. The car is very popular at entry-level rallycross events, since it's lighter and is easier to learn than it's largest competitor in the same class, the Volvo 240. This plug-in is released as Public Domain, contact C14ru5 on the Ambrosia Web Board if you need source files to create your own spin-off product.

3025.title: Hedge Pack 1.0
3025.author: Anonymous
3025.description: JoshTigerheart's Department of Useful Plugs has now invaded Redline!  With the release of Hedge Pack, it is now attempting to dominate the Redline arena as well as the Nova arena, both attempts it will probably fail at.  Anyways, Hedge Pack contains a pair of tracks:  Hedge Straight and Hedge Maze.  The former is more straight forward, the latter you have no clue where you are.  Both feature intersecting roads with hedges that obscure your vision until you pass through, making collisions with other racers very likely.  See readme for more details.  It is recommended you use Stuffit Expander to extract the files, as they are in .bin.zip format.  All questions, comments, bug reports, and rootbeer should be sent to the address within the readme.

3021.title: ForestRace-v1.0.2.redplug.zip
3021.author: Anonymous
3021.description: Forest Race 1.0.2 by [Ak4]DarkRaverNL, this is a short and simple track to race on, it contains an Lite version for slower macs, this track might drop your FPS alot, so then its wise to use the Lite version, wich has no objects in it, you can drive this in Normal and reverse mode, both are best at Sunrise or Moonlight, it includes an track overview, its not 100% accurate but enough to see where you are, enjoy !

2998.title: Schtorftris.redplug
2998.author: Anonymous
2998.description: Tetris on the road, which comes as a car that is annoying, yet utterly funny to drive. Simple model, rather slow, comes in various colors. This is most enjoyable in multilayer mode with sound turned on. Enjoy, Schtorf.

3044.title: SpringfieldFallingTrees.redplug
3044.author: Anonymous
3044.description: Long track with default roadtypes and overview and overview. Two points you must consider: those things won't fall if you don't crash into them, and some crashes in the trees tunnel would be the end of the race for you, or your opponent...

2970.title: gcw-mog3w.v1.10
2970.author: Anonymous
2970.description:
An interpretation of a 1933 Morgan three wheeler Aero Super Sports with a J.A.P. JTOR 996cc V-Twin racing engine.

v1.10:
Now has the proper v-twin engine sound, a much revised model with proper shadowing, more skins, revised handling, drastically altered brakes and the proper name.

You're well advised to use the front hand-brakes entering a sharp deceleration rather than the rear wheel brakes as they provide a much more stable braking effect.

3010.title: Bizarre Mountain.redplug.sitx
3010.author: Anonymous
3010.description:
My first attempt at a Redline track. Comments and advice (particularly positive, helpful ones!) would be appreciated.

This track has (mostly) smooth hills and criss-crosses itself a number of times. It's good for turbo and fast racing. Enjoy!

- AGP

3034.title: Run and Jump.redplug
3034.author: Anonymous
3034.description: Longish track with a very small slalom, small serpentine, long straight-of-way which can be used to reach top speed on any vehicle, and a HUGE jump which is good for fun and for testing the balance of various cars.  This can be used to test the various qualities of cars , for testing the ability of drivers, and just for fun times racing others. Updated so the slalom is well spaced, and all bugs have been worked out (except that the AI still crashes on the serpentine), including where it would show "Untitled Track" instead of "Run and Jump".  Have Fun!

2990.title: NyrksDiablo
2990.author: Anonymous
2990.description: The Nyrk's Diablo, only a bit of play with more torque at low RPM, more HP, a bit of look and feel (and stability too) with modified wheels. Tested in Arcade mode, also at Simulation. Enjoy!

2933.title: AerostarSport.redplug
2933.author: Anonymous
2933.description: Don't underestimate this. Designed and buillt like a truck, this has plenty of towing power. It also come equipped with abundant towing power, which come in handy during races. May not be a sports car, but this is NOT your mom's minivan. This is a man's minivan!!!! Created by Tyranitar. Special thanks to Beta testers Cowgirl, Valkyria, Chaon, and Conis. Also special thanks to Screwup and General Antilles.  Now with and enhanced gearbox, improved COG, and increased wind resistance.  Now has a higher top speed, but is still imited in Sim and Acrade modes by frontal wind resistance.  This replaces the 2008Aerostar.redplug

2968.title: gcw-f156-v1.0
2968.author: Anonymous
2968.description:
This is the car that Phil Hill and Wolfgang 'Taffy' von Trips drove in the 1961 Formula One championship. Phil Hill went on to win the championship but sadly Von Trips and fourteen spectators were killed when his car left the track at Monza during the Italian Grand Prix.

I based this model on photos and models of the car, particularly the features of the car during Phil Hill's record-breaking under nine minute run at the Nurburgring Nordschleife.

The model is quite detailed, with 9776 triangles in total including the wheels and driver.

2949.title: BugattiType35 2.2
2949.author: Anonymous
2949.description: The Bugatti Type 35 was one of the most successful ever racing cars, winning over 1,000 races in its time. It took the Grand Prix World Championship in 1926 after winning 351 races and setting 47 records in the two prior years. This car is a creative interpretation of the supercharged Type 35C, the model that won the 1928 and 1930 French Grand Prix.

3016.title: bru-Snow-to-Dirt
3016.author: Anonymous
3016.description: Snow Track - Dirt Edition: A wide, sloppy, dirty variation of Redline's Snow track. Lots of room for passing, big banks on the sides of the road to use, and a few bumps replacing the big jump.

3001.title: Toyota Supra
3001.author: Anonymous
3001.description:
Plugin created by Andreu.

This is the 1998 Turbo version of the sadly discontinued Toyota Supra, an icon in itself. This car is sexy. That's pretty much all there is to say about it. YEah it handles yadda yadda. Just drive it and see for yourself. Sweet ride. It needs adjustments, but once I get it right, it will really smoke!
I hope this is 100 words!

Enjoy!

2939.title: AmInd MGMidgetV0.0.2a
2939.author: Anonymous
2939.description:
This is my car in real life. I aim to eventually get the driving expirience to be identical to being in the drivers seat of the real thing. For now, here is an alpha version. complete with actual engine sounds I recorded myself. let me know what you think. sethamosjones@gmail.com

Get the latest version, try it out and delete the previous one.  We wont be needing that anymore

3279.title: Death Loop
3279.author: GUMMY BEAR
3279.description: This is the first track I have ever produced.  I think it is a fun track to mess with.  I know it is not the most detailed track or even the cleanest track, but it works and it is fun.

3227.title: VW GTI 2009
3227.author: haz
3227.description:
I made this car. It has a few more colors, rather than the older one which had only 1 color.
There is also a new horn.

2955.title: ClioSport.zip
2955.author: Anonymous
2955.description:
Fixed minor issues: Missing line from .car file, plates possition.
This model is about 700 polys so it should run smoothly.
Included 4 colors as sold in Mexico from 2002 to 2005.
I tried to make it fun and real. It's supposed to go from 0-100km/h in about 7.2 seconds...
Please read the readme file.

3000.title: Toyota-MR2-Spyder-v.1.0
3000.author: Anonymous
3000.description: 2005 Toyota MR2 Spyder. A light, nimble RWD convertible that makes for fun races against the Mini, Golf, or other cars of that class. As fun to drive in Simulation mode as it is in Turbo. Special care has been taken to make this model render well on slower machines. Enjoy! - RLaddict

2980.title: HummerH2.redplug
2980.author: Anonymous
2980.description:
A slow of-road Hummer H2. Good for rally racing, but don't even try it in a race track. It has a top speed of 133 MPH (214 kp/h). Please note I'm not good with collition boxes, feel free to unplug it and edit anything you like or use anything.
Version 0.5 (BETA)
-FireFalcon

3003.title: USTCC Golf V1.2.redplug
3003.author: Anonymous
3003.description: Oh Snap!  It's the USTCC GTI V1.2!  Besides featuring totally new wheels (compliments of A-rod), the handling is slightly massaged, the interior redone (sorry to Val for the last version-this should fix that), and the torque peak is lowered a tad. The result: one sweet handling, sweet driving ride.  Enjoy, and safe driving!

3295.title: BEAR'S Loop 2.0
3295.author: GUMMY BEAR
3295.description: Here is an updated version of my BL track.  I had always wanted to make my own BL track, and so here is the result.  I hope you like it.

3051.title: Zaarocks valley 1.5.redplug
3051.author: Anonymous
3051.description:
a better version of zaarocks valley track, longer, has overview and its smoother.

by zaarock, creator of Dalek and dalek twin turbo.

2928.title: bru-weather-1.1
2928.author: Anonymous
2928.description: Bruce's weather 1.1 - Makes an asphalt track drive as if it were dirt or ice. Details are found in the readme.txt file included in the download. V1.1 cleans up some appearance and sound problems and adds a new weather called haze, which simulates driving in the 1960s.

3033.title: Run and Jump
3033.author: Anonymous
3033.description: Longish track with a very small slalom, small serpentine, long straight-of-way which can be used to reach top speed on any vehicle, and a HUGE jump which is good for fun and for testing the balance of various cars. This can be used to test the various qualities of cars , for testing the ability of drivers, and just for fun times racing others. Updated so the bugs have been worked out and the hill is not so rough a transition.

3013.title: bru-Forest-Circuit
3013.author: Anonymous
3013.description: Forest Circuit - A long, diverse, challenging track for car and driver. This track may be best suited for learning or developing cars. Two laps will give you a very good idea of the personality of a car, both on the road and on dirt. Based on the Forest Trail track by Ak4_DarkRaverNL.

2936.title: Allard J2x.sitx
2936.author: Anonymous
2936.description: The Allard J2x was a mighty beast in its day.  In the early 1950's few cars could keep up with it on a long straightaway.  It was originally shipped to the US from england without engines because there were so many wonderful American V8s to choose from. For now try it out with a 331 Hemi engine.

3357.title: Dragways 2
3357.author: MrMasaTasa
3357.description: Dragways 2 V 1.0. Good for testing. Mercedes SL300 is best on this track.

3244.title: Modified Charger (1966)
3244.author: Dodge man 41
3244.description: A mopar with a chevy 454. What a good combo!

2929.title: Examples.redplug
2929.author: Anonymous
2929.description: This is a plug containing the VW Bus (jechter bulli), Pickup Ratrod (jechter - oldford),  and the Valley Race Track (valley track). These are included in the Redline Tool Chest and I liked them so much I wanted to be able to play with them with everybody, even if they weren't interested in making custom content for redline. (The cars and track contained within this plug were not made by me and I accept no credit either explicit or implied for their creation, Alls I did was make 'em into a plug and upload it onto the in-tron-net.)

2946.title: bru-Toyota MR2-1.0
2946.author: Anonymous
2946.description: This is a reworking of RLAddict's Toyota MR2 Spyder model. Included here is a high performance option with a Celica engine and better rear tires. The car still likes to spin, especially at low speeds. This model will keep up with the Golf type cars, and the high performance option will keep up with the next faster cars.

2947.title: bru-Viper-GNX
2947.author: Anonymous
2947.description: Viper GNX. The Viper body was shortened, the roof raised a bit, and other modifications were made. The drivetrain is 1987 Buick GNX. The Viper GNX is near the Mustang in speed.

2937.title: AlluBus.redplug
2937.author: Anonymous
2937.description:
This file includes 2 VW Buses,  AlluBus the hippie van, and Ratataksi. AlluBus is slow  and it has 3 nice paintjobs.It is fun to drive on wet road.
Ratataksi is made for fast driving. it has very stiff suspension and its lowered a bit

3022.title: gcw-ball-plug.v1.0
3022.author: Anonymous
3022.description:
This adds one entity ('gcw-ball.ent') and one modified track ('gcw-city3.mapinfo'). The entity is an attempt at a ball capable of being used in road ball games, this is tricky because of the cuboid collision models used in Redline. This entity uses seven collision blocks and rolls - just. The ball is 2m in diameter, and I mirrored the surface - just for show!

The map supplied is the City Short Circuit with a ball added 100m along the start-finish straight (100.0, 1.0, 0.0).

2957.title: Dalek Hover 1.1.redplug
2957.author: Anonymous
2957.description: Heres a recreation of Xaerocks great Dalek Twin Turbo and Regular Dalek. Its the 'Hover' Dalek' You're all gonna love it.

2959.title: Diablo Dragster 1.0.redplug.sit
2959.author: Anonymous
2959.description: This is a suped up verson of the Diablo. It is named the Diablo Dragster because it is just that a fast deoblo {not for sim}

2942.title: bru-audi-roswell
2942.author: Anonymous
2942.description: You've heard the rumors. Secret underground labs. Machines that are apparently able to defy the laws of physics. You've seen the movies and TV shows: X-Files, Repo Man. Truth, or fiction? Drive the Audi Roswell down a lonely stretch of road at night and find out for yourself.

3333.title: Squirm II
3333.author: Anonymous
3333.description: This is a basic Redline track where the AI are fast and the track is tight. Squirm II is fun to drive and easy to drive, but if you want a great lap time, you must focus.

3046.title: valley track fixed
3046.author: Anonymous
3046.description:
This is a minor fix to the sample track in the Toolbox (whenever it's released). Simply, without this fix, the game will brutally crash when certain cars reach the tunnel.

I don't exactly intend to release many other things, if any, but I will debug if people request. Contact redline [at] io-in.com for more info.

3217.title: Cars
3217.author: haz
3217.description: Here are a few pictures of cars you can put on your name. Please don't copy the one I have on my name.

3031.title: Redline Football Pitch 2
3031.author: Anonymous
3031.description: New and improved version of the Football Pitch distinguishable goals, better overall pysics, and much better looking! By Fuglz The New Bird

2960.title: diablo pimped
2960.author: Anonymous
2960.description:
Pimped Diablo Beta 3.  Now has Countach wheels and better turning and braking.

The Pimped Diablo has a sixth gear, goes crazy fast backwards, is much faster than the stock Diablo, has much fatter rear tires, and an engine grade like the DeLorean's but much smaller, actually mocking the successor to the Diablo, the Murcielago.

3030.title: obstacle road.redplug.hqx
3030.author: Anonymous
3030.description:
Obstacle road is my first track add-on for redline! I hope you'll have fun with it!!
Autor: Nikolaus (Challenges Master)
Note! There's no overview during the game...

2930.title: flag icons
2930.author: Anonymous
2930.description: For those of you that know how to add images to your Redline multiplayer name and who would like to do a bit of patriotic flag-waving while they're racing, this plug-in adds 69 national flags that can be used. Note that only players with this plug-in will be able to see your flag, but not having the plug-in does not prevent them from racing with you.

2948.title: bru-VW-Van
2948.author: Anonymous
2948.description: VW/Subaru Van 4WD. This model is good just for bashing around the courses. It is not very sophisticated or realistic. The Subaru WRX STi engine transplant gives it pretty good speed. Ridiculously wide tires help the handling. Four wheel drive helps in the snow and dirt. Silly paint jobs include psychedelic sunburst, rock and roll roadie, and crunchy granola "green" with bamboo fiber body panels. Based on an example included in the Redline Tool Chest.

3011.title: bru-Canyon-Snow
3011.author: Anonymous
3011.description: Canyon Snow: Did you ever wonder what Redline's Canyon Race Track would be like if it snowed? Wonder no more...

2944.title: bru-ford-truck-tall-xc
2944.author: Anonymous
2944.description: Ford Truck Tall XC - This model replaces the earlier Ford Truck Tall. New colors and new suspension tuning for the Mariposa course. The body is derived from the Redline Tool Chest 68 Ford truck, the engine is from Redline's 55 Ford Pickup Truck.

3008.title: AmInd EhraLesseinV0.1
3008.author: Anonymous
3008.description: Ehra-Lessien is the test track in Germany where Top Gear's James May Drove the Bugatti Veyron to its top speed.  Laps are 20 Km in length and it features a 9 KM unbroken, perfectly level straight.  According to Wikipedia, "the track is owned by Volkswagen it is thus open to all its subsidiaries like Audi, Lamborghini, Bentley, Bugatti, SEAT, Skoda as well as to Porsche, which has a 30% share in the firm."  In this version the bankings and scenery are not done, but it is still a useful too to determine speed and performance.

3214.title: VW GTI 2009
3214.author: haz
3214.description: A VW Golf GTI for Redline. The gear ratios I've done not very well, but if you use manual I don't think it will be as bad. I hope to improve on this car.

2975.title: Hennessey Venom
2975.author: Anonymous
2975.description:
Venom...The name puts fear in the hearts of lesser men, and now it's available on Redline! With 1000 HP and 1100 TQ, the Hennessey Venom is the ultimate supercar. Based on the Dodge Viper, the Venom features a twin turbo 8.5L V-10 putting the power.  The results? 0-60 in under 3 seconds.  1/4 mile in 9.8.  Top speed at 250+.  Yes, the Hennessey Venom is the real deal, and now available for your downloading pleasure.  

Credit goes to:
The Redline staff: body
RLaddict: wheels
A-rod: .car

3047.title: Vengeance
3047.author: Anonymous
3047.description: A map with spacial anomalies. Watch out on the areas marked on the map.  Don't drive off the side of the track in these areas because you'll get thrown back a lap.  Very hard for hover cars.  Website: http://evweb.aresaxis.us/  Email: ajwweb@earthlink.net

3343.title: Kane Kurves
3343.author: mR. ZiP
3343.description: This is my first attempt at a serious Redline track. It has a fairly good mix of high- and medium-speed corners, and is quite long for a looped track.

3205.title: MyFirstPlugin.zip
3205.author: a.b.s.
3205.description: This is my first addon for redline. I plan to improve it. This is my first redline track.

3207.title: Dragways-fixed.redplug
3207.author: anonnymous+A.B.S
3207.description:
Dragways-fixed.redplug
This .redplug file is a fix to all people who were having trouble running the "Dragways.redplug" tracks. My RL did not start when i had this plugin in my plugin folder so I unpacked the plugin and opened the .mapinfo files (the ones wich say wich roadtypes are used etc.) and i found a line wich went like this:
"roadTypes "sandy_dragway.roadtypes"" but there were no sandy_dragway.roadtypes in the plugin. so I unpacked the "Sandy Dragway"plugin and found the roadtypes there. I copyed the missing roadtypes in to the plugin and that was that.
Special credit goes to whoever made the Plugin splitter for Redline.

3032.title: RL Zolder plug-in v1.2
3032.author: Anonymous
3032.description:
Zolder track version 1.2, now the biggest bumps have been taken out, overview is slightly better in place...
working steadily on 1.3 (bumps before jacky ickx have been smoothened there), still no modelling though, no time yet...
If anyone cares to help, it would be welcomed (you'll get credit for it on the splash)

3020.title: Dragways
3020.author: Anonymous
3020.description:
Special tracks for speedy cars:
HSH: A long highway, some tough turns and a long streightway.
BS: A two side track w/ a hole of dirt in between.
DRA: Just a loop, the turns are easy. No need to stop.
Enjoy, FireFalcon.

3014.title: bru-Forest-Dirt
3014.author: Anonymous
3014.description: This is an all dirt course. If you like the Small Rally Track you may like this. This course was converted to dirt from the Forest Race course made by [AK4]DarkRaverNL.

2938.title: AmInd MGMidgetv0.0.1a
2938.author: Anonymous
2938.description:
This is my car in real life.  I aim to eventually get the driving expirience to be identical to being in the drivers seat of the real thing.  For now, here is an alpha version.  complete with actual engine sounds I recorded myself.  let me know what you think.

sethamosjones@gmail.com

3294.title: GUMMY'S LOOP 1.0
3294.author: GUMMY BEAR
3294.description: This is my attempt at a BL track. It is slightly lacking, but it is a fun track to mess with. I hope you enjoy.
